column3: ACK. This might solve a few random RPC crashes.\n
I believe delete of int\* is identical to just free, so i doubt it will change anything in practice.\n
@sipa it's not -- it might work with some compilers, but not by definition in the C++ standard, doing so gives "undefined behavior"\n
Sure... it certainly requires fixing because of that, but I doubt it's a problem in practice for the platforms we're using.\n
